meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Doug Baker Ben Smolen Lisa Schlitt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7457.

td.p: Doug Baker, a sustainability specialist from Tecumseh, Michigan
Ben Smolen, a writer from Los Angeles, California
Lisa Schlitt, a microbiologist from Berwyn, Pennsylvania (whose 2-day cash winnings total $43,000)

tr.td: 18th CENTURY AMERICAN WRITIN' & SPEAKIN'
THEATER GLOSSARY
THE SPORT'S BOOK
TRAVEL & TOURISM
COOL RHYMES
(Alex: Name the system, given the clue, in...)
SYSTEMS PRIMED

tr.td: Lisa
Ben
Doug
THE FUTURE OF THE UNIVERSE

THE DRUMMER SINGS
JOHN DONNE
NO MAN
AN "I" LAND
